DocAttribute.Name: SpecificHeatCapacity
DocAttribute.Documentation: Specific heat of the products of combustion: heat energy absorbed per temperature unit. Usually measured in [J/kg K].

DocAttribute.Name: N20Content
DocAttribute.Documentation: Nitrous Oxide (N~2~O) content of the products of combustion. This is measured in weight of N~2~O per unit weight and is therefore unitless.

DocAttribute.Name: COContent
DocAttribute.Documentation: Carbon monoxide (CO) content of the products of combustion.This is measured in weight of CO per unit weight and is therefore unitless.

DocAttribute.Name: CO2Content
DocAttribute.Documentation: Carbon Dioxide (CO~2~) content of the products of combustion. This is measured in weight of CO~2~ per unit weight and is therefore unitless.
